--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, naren_nair@h... wrote:
> hello guys
> i am a new person in this field
> i need to know why and when an AssertionFailedError occures
> is it beacuse of the way we do testing or some units need not be 
> tested. or is it beacuse of the types of assertions we use (the 
wrong 
> assertion at the wrong place)
> 
> hoping for a very nice reply frm every one in the JUnit team
> regards
> Narendran


AssertionFailedError occures when what your excepted is not the same 
as what the act is.I think AssertionFailedError is to notify the test 
result of yout test.
